cast.overview: An unassuming high schooler finds himself inexplicably drawn to the free-spirited new girl, whose unconventional ways change how they see themselves…and their world.
cast.title: Stargirl

details.biography: Gabriella Elizabeth Surodjawan is an actress, and was born on May 5th, 2005, in New Mexico, USA. She is now a prosperous dancer and actor, and aspires to continue on with film and TV into the future. She has appeared in Stranger Things (2016-2022), Running with the Devil (2019 movie), Kaya (2018 short), Sawyer (2020 movie) and Stargirl (2020 movie); as well as school plays, theatre, and skits. She has also appeared in commercials and independent movies too. In addition to this, she is also an athlete.
details.name: Gabriella Surodjawan
